metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Blood Sugar is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Blood Sugar is written in the key of G Locrian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 10th most popular key among Locrian keys and     the 82nd most popular  among all keys. The G Locrian scale is similar to the G Minor scale except that both the 2nd and the 5th notes (A♭ and D♭) are a half step lower.  This means that the characteristic "home base" chord of G Locrian has a dissonant diminished quality (g˚), which makes it a very uncommon choice for songs.

See the G Locrian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
